name: Jikki Pachi-Slot Simulator Vol. 1
summary: Simulating the mechanics and rules of a pachislot machine, the game can be played in the strategy, battle or introductory modes. The player can choose from a selection of six different machine designs, which are based on real-life machines. The player configures the options token bets and paylines in a separate menu before playing the on the slot machine. Each slot row can be stopped at the press of a controller button.
